```{r echo=FALSE}
dir <- system.file("extdata", package = "bioBakeryR")
datePath <- file.path(dir, "date_of_last_update.txt")

con <- file(datePath, "r")
date <- readLines(con, n = 1)
close(con)
```

Below is the description on input and ouput of the bioBakeryR workflow last update
on `r date`.

```{r echo=FALSE, collapse=FALSE}
dir <- system.file("extdata", package = "bioBakeryR")
desc <- readRDS(file.path(dir, "desc.rds"))
cat(desc)
```
